import React, { useState } from 'react'; const ImageSlider = () => { const images = [ "./images/Eve.jpg", "./images/Aduke.jpg", "./images/DamDam.jpeg", "./images/Funmilayo.jpg", "./images/Grandeur.jpg", "./images/Olufayo.jpg", ] const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0); const nextSlide = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex + 1) % images.length); }; const prevSlide = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => prevIndex === 0 ? images.length - 1 : prevIndex - 1); }; return (
{images.map((image, index) => ( ))}
